text: [Music]
I think the most important thing I
wanted them to take from the book is
that every big problem that we face in
the 21st
century uh has a religious Dimension
that is to say whether it's energy or
social justice or global warming or
poverty or water uh uh if we try to
solve these problems without dealing
with the religions and the religious
aspirations and fears and hopes of the
people involved we will probably come up
with the wrong solutions to those
problems and so we need to understand
religion in the same way we need to
understand the climate and energy and
water uh if because good intentions
aren't enough we have to we have to deal
intelligently and with with knowledge
about these phenomena and so we should
we should we should study religion much
more intensively so that we don't blow
it
